ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Greetings fellow Questers
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: Clay  To:  Sent: Wednesday, April 23, 2003 10:30 AM Subject: [EverQuest] Greetings fellow Questers
ygData.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: "Clay" <wolffmanus@...>
To: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, April 23, 2003 10:30 AM
Subject: [EverQuest] Greetings fellow Questers


> I have mostly played Shamans and have had a blast. Thanks to the
> others here I have been able to advance my Shaman into the high 20s.
>
> I now have a problem and again ask for some help...I am trying a Bar.
> Beastlord.
>
> I now need to find a place to move on to and advance in levels, with
> my shaman I found I "ran in to a wall" at 15th level and it was like
> pulling teeth to make 16th , 17 and 18th levels. I want of avoid this
> with my BL.
>
> I have made it to 15th level (thanks to Mammoth calfs and wrath orc
> wristbands) I have all my spells for 15th level, most of my armor is
> magic or BL newbee Quest armor. I have the Newbee Claw,and a harpoon
> I could use a better hth weapon but by all acounts I am doing good.
>
> Where does a 15th level Bar. Beastlord hunt to make levels in good
> time?
>
> I thank you and will keep you all informed on how I do.
>
> Wolff
>
You can try Paludal Caverns fighting recondite bandits and those phlarg
fiends or whatever they're called that cast disease on you... Or even try
killing the mushrooms in PC. Or you can try killing gnolls and orcs in
highpass. Even bandits might give you xp at this point. The only problem is
that they changed the pathing for gnolls and orcs so instead of staying at
their spawn point, they wander off to the guards and can sometimes attack
you when you are fighting the bandits. Bandits sometimes drop pearls which
are good to keep for components for cleric and mage spells. If you ever need
to be summoned by a mage, it takes a pearl. Pearls are also used by
enchanters for making vials of viscous mana. Oh, and the weapons the bandits
drop are pretty good too. Dalishea is the highest level of the 3 bandits.
The dwarf is the next highest.
luv,
-Su
